BBEX3.A.GHC.USD.CA.AC.A04: Exchange rates for the US dollar in Ghana / USD 1 = GHC ... (middle)

General: With effect from 1 July 2007, a currency conversion took place at the rate of 10,000 cedi (GHC) = 1 Ghana cedi (GHS). The currency conversion did not entail any appreciation or depreciation against other currencies.
Source: Ghana Commercial Bank and Bank of Ghana, Accra.
Methodology: Calculated on the basis of month-end buying and selling rates.
